name: kstools.com - Tools and more
description: We are proud to be able to offer you our KS TOOLS app free of charge. That way you have helpful functions set up on your Smartphone under one app. See for yourself.  The following features are included in this app:   1. Protractor  With this tool it is possible to easily and quickly measure tilt angle.   2. Level It was programmed to weigh vertical, horizontal, or 45  angle surfaces.  3. Ruler With this tool, it is possible to measure lengths easily.   4. Plump Line Keep your iPhone upright to the desired object, the plumb line shows deviations in degrees on the X and Y axis.  5. Pocket lamp With our flashlight you cant only bring light into the darkness, but you can even Morse code distress signal SOS emergency.  6. Pocket calculator Add, subtract, multiply, divide, calculate percents and much more - with our pocket calculator, no task remains unresolved.  7. Online-Shop The extensive KS Tools online store offers them the opportunity to view our products from a wide range of detail.  8. Promotions Here you can see the latest offers and promotions.  9. Toolchannel With our wide variety of application videos you will be helped by the handling of our tools.  10. Toolfinder Supporting you finding the needed Timing adjusting tools, you can use the Tool Finder. By entering engine identification or OE number the right tool will be displayed.  11. Barcode + QR Code Scanner With our Scanners, barcodes and QR codes can be scanned. To have the ability to easily compare prices with the prices in our shop. When scanning QR codes read out the contents will be displayed. If this was clearly due to a link that will call up this directly.  12. Clipfinder The right clips for your vehicle you can find out in our ClipFinder based on the OE-Number.  13. Decibel measurement device With this device you can perform decibel measurement.  14. Find a dealer With this function you can display your next KS Tools dealer  Please feel free to visit us on our website www.kstools.com to get more information about us and our tools, there are catalogues and brochures available for viewing and download.
